thread.title: Report: Rita Ora and Travis Barker Split After Three Weeks of Dating
thread.title_full: Report: Rita Ora and Travis Barker Split After Three Weeks of Dating

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Report: Rita Ora and Travis Barker Split After Three Weeks of Dating
text:
Comments 'I don't have that longing to be in a relationship 24/7,' says Travis who reportedly doesn't want to be in a serious relationship with Rita. 
Rita Ora and Travis Barker have called it quits on their relationship, according to Mirror. The news outlet quoted the Blink-182 drummer as saying that he didn't want to be in a serious relationship with the "I Will Never Let You Down" singer. "I don't have that longing to be in a relationship 24/7," Travis told the website. The rocker also revealed that his priorities were his children and music. He also admitted that he's "an a**hole to women." Of his romance with Rita, the 39-year-old musician said that it "came out of nowhere" and they "just [enjoyed] it." The breakup news came just three weeks after they began dating . Earlier this month, Travis explained how he met the British beauty . "I performed there with Tyga and Kid Ink . We had just met through passing. We have a mutual friend named Willie T. I had walked up and he was like, 'Yo, take a picture with Rita.' And I was like, 'Okay.' " At that time, the musician admitted that he was amazed by Rita. "We just took a photo together, but obviously she's stunning and she's awesome," he confessed. "Of course Rita Ora was like the only hot cheerleader at the whole spot, so you couldn't help but notice her."
